feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -27.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -27.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
